name: VR Helmet Comfort Test
description:
There are studies that suggest obscuring vision with a 3D mesh might help with comfort but does it actually work? 

Here is a quickly made level to find out, only a handful of things have any interactivity.  

This is made to be Half Life-ish because it was submitted as proof of concept for the HL2 VR mod currently in development, the focus is on driving with the helm on and off. 

Let me know how it feels!
